Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.BasicFeatures
    other features replace the functionality of this one, do not use!
    net.semanticmetadata.lire.impl.DocumentFactory
    no longer needed, will be deleted.
    net.semanticmetadata.lire.impl.GenericImageSearcher 
    net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.bovw.SiftFeatureHistogramBuilder 
    net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.bovw.SurfFeatureHistogramBuilder 
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    net.semanticmetadata.lire.ImageSearcherFactory.createColorOnlySearcher(int)
    Use ColorHistogram or ScalableColor instead
    net.semanticmetadata.lire.ImageSearcherFactory.createSimpleSearcher(int)
    Use ColorLayout, EdgeHistogram and ScalableColor features instead.
    net.semanticmetadata.lire.DocumentBuilderFactory.getColorOnlyDocumentBuilder()
    Use ColorHistogram and the respective factory methods to get it instead
    net.semanticmetadata.lire.DocumentBuilderFactory.getExtensiveDocumentBuilder()
    Use ChainedDocumentBuilder instead
    net.semanticmetadata.lire.DocumentBuilderFactory.getFastDocumentBuilder()
    use MPEG-7 feature ColorLayout or CEDD, which are both really fast.
